channel.title: Motion
channel.description:
hey ive been experementing with photoshop trying out different ways to make an object look like its moving
heres one i made, tell me what you think and smethings i could improve
before: [img]http://msmvps.com/photos/patrice/images/107355/425x282.aspx[/img]
after: [img]http://onlyonerule.pwnds.info/portfolio/Image%20Gallery/uploads/9153c6451d7d1218969c05f8968e61af350z%20copy.jpg[/img]
updated: blended it a bit more [img]http://onlyonerule.pwnds.info/portfolio/Image%20Gallery/uploads/0790c227ff14dafc39752be10cfb8873350z2%20copy.jpg[/img]
ok took you advice Pretty Easy but now it definitally looks like itsw wraped in plastic [img]http://onlyonerule.pwnds.info/portfolio/Image%20Gallery/uploads/7f0e37d6505a9709fc917218e571cf72350z22%20copy.jpg[/img]

item.title: Motion
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:2, topic:134486”]Looks like you wrapped it in a condom imo.[/quote]Hahaha, that made my day, thanks. Darken it a bit, put the lines what exe said and blur a little.

item.title: Motion
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I would have to say, that plastic wrap around the car is kinda funky. Speed is usually expressed with lines pulling from 1 direction.

Read full topic
